dct_title_s: Cruchley's new plan of London: shewing all the new and intended improvements to the present time.; Cruchley's new plan of London with the East and West India docks, improved to 1844: coloured to show the various routes of the omnibus [wds obscured] a table of reference to upwards of [wds. obscured] principal streets, squares [wds. obscured], public buildings, etc. with the railways and stations
dct_description_sm: In slide box. Includes indexes. In lower left: a new edition improved to Jany. 1st 1843. 1 map: col., dissected and mounted on canvas; 38 x 79 cm., folded in box 15 x 9 cm.
dct_rights_sm: This map is in the public domain.
dct_rightsHolder_sm: Please attribute access and use of this digitized map to the Stephen S. Clark Library, University of Michigan Library. https://www.lib.umich.edu/about-us/policies/copyright-policy
